title: Devfest'18
description: Devfest Algiers'18 theme was "Digital wellbeing" It was enriched by a Hackathon, a set of different workshops and conferences.

title: Devfest 2019
description: DevFest Algiers 2019, in its 8th edition, held the "Diversity and inclusion" as a theme. Diversity & Inclusion (D&I) is a very important base that is considered to be an essential factor of equality and social cohesion, it aims to create a healthy, serene and inclusive work environment of all categories in the community, social and professional that fights against all kinds of discrimination.

title: Devfest 2020
description: Last year's DevFest was about "Online Safety", and because of the pandemic, it was held online for the safety of everyone. It had three main tracks: Talks, a competiton, panels, equity in tech session by WTM Algiers, which made a great appearance.
